message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 ON CONFLICT clause does not match any PRIMARY KEY or UNIQUE constraint.
details:
[12-Dec-2024 13:24:51 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

INSERT INTO wp_divi_squad_custom_fields (meta_key, post_type) SELECT DISTINCT pm.meta_key, p.post_type FROM wp_postmeta pm INNER JOIN wp_posts p ON p.ID = pm.post_id WHERE p.post_type IN ('post') AND pm.meta_key NOT LIKE '_%' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wp_postmeta pm2 INNER JOIN wp_posts p2 ON p2.ID = pm2.post_id WHERE pm2.meta_key = CONCAT('_', pm.meta_key) AND p2.post_type = p.post_type ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

  5. Executing: INSERT INTO wp_divi_squad_custom_fields (meta_key, post_type) SELECT DISTINCT pm.meta_key, p.post_type FROM wp_postmeta pm INNER JOIN wp_posts p ON p.ID = pm.post_id WHERE p.post_type IN (:param0 ) AND pm.meta_key NOT LIKE :param1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wp_postmeta pm2 INNER JOIN wp_posts p2 ON p2.ID = pm2.post_id WHERE pm2.meta_key = (:param2 || pm.meta_key) AND p2.post_type = p.post_type ) ON CONFLICT ("meta_key") DO UPDATE SET last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP | parameters: post, _%, _
